snippet: Hassan Rouhani said he was determined to reach an agreement with the West in order to have sanctions lifted.
abstract: Iranian Pres Hassan Rouhani stresses that he is determined to cinch nuclear deal and is prepared to take on conservative forces who would prefer not to see agreement with the West; stance risks Rouhani's political standing.
lead_paragraph: Hassan Rouhani said he was determined to reach an agreement with the West in order to have sanctions lifted.

headline.main: Iran’s President Pledges to Face Down Forces Opposing a Nuclear Deal
headline.print_headline: President of Iran Vows Nuclear Deal
